blocks.name: tfisg
blocks.content: A closed form of ~ tfis . (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 8-Jun-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm tfisg(setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(wral(s0, con0, wi(wral(s1, cv(s0), wsbc(s0, cv(s1), w0)), w0)), wral(s0, con0, w0))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  sylib(wral(s0, con0, wi(wral(s1, cv(s0), wsbc(s0, cv(s1), w0)), w0)), wral(s0, con0, w0), wceq(con0, crab(s0, con0, w0)))
  eqcomd(con0, crab(s0, con0, w0), wral(s0, con0, wi(wral(s1, cv(s0), wsbc(s0, cv(s1), w0)), w0)))
  sylancr(wral(s0, con0, wi(wral(s1, cv(s0), wsbc(s0, cv(s1), w0)), w0)), wceq(crab(s0, con0, w0), con0), wss(crab(s0, con0, w0), con0), wral(hs0, con0, wi(wss(cv(hs0), crab(s0, con0, w0)), wcel(cv(hs0), crab(s0, con0, w0)))))
  ssrab2(s0, con0, w0)
  ralrimiva(hs0, con0, wral(s0, con0, wi(wral(s1, cv(s0), wsbc(s0, cv(s1), w0)), w0)), wi(wss(cv(hs0), crab(s0, con0, w0)), wcel(cv(hs0), crab(s0, con0, w0))))
  syl6ibr(wa(wral(s0, con0, wi(wral(s1, cv(s0), wsbc(s0, cv(s1), w0)), w0)), wcel(cv(hs0), con0)), wss(cv(hs0), crab(s0, con0, w0)), wcel(cv(hs0), crab(s0, con0, w0)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), con0), wsbc(s0, cv(hs0), w0)))
  jctild(wa(wral(s0, con0, wi(wral(s1, cv(s0), wsbc(s0, cv(s1), w0)), w0)), wcel(cv(hs0), con0)), wss(cv(hs0), crab(s0, con0, w0)), wcel(cv(hs0), con0), wsbc(s0, cv(hs0), w0))
  syl5(wa(wral(s0, con0, wi(wral(s1, cv(s0), wsbc(s0, cv(s1), w0)), w0)), wcel(cv(hs0), con0)), wss(cv(hs0), crab(s0, con0, w0)), wsbc(s0, cv(hs0), w0), wral(s1, cv(hs0), wsbc(s0, cv(s1), w0)))
  sylbi(wss(cv(hs0), crab(s0, con0, w0)), wral(s1, cv(hs0), wsbc(s0, cv(s1), w0)), wral(s1, cv(hs0), wcel(cv(s1), crab(s0, con0, w0))))
  dfss3(s1, cv(hs0), crab(s0, con0, w0))
  ralimi(s1, cv(hs0), wcel(cv(s1), crab(s0, con0, w0)), wsbc(s0, cv(s1), w0))
  simprbi(wcel(cv(s1), crab(s0, con0, w0)), wsbc(s0, cv(s1), w0), wcel(cv(s1), con0))
  elrabsf(s0, cv(s1), con0, w0)
  impcom(wral(s0, con0, wi(wral(s1, cv(s0), wsbc(s0, cv(s1), w0)), w0)), wcel(cv(hs0), con0), wi(wral(s1, cv(hs0), wsbc(s0, cv(s1), w0)), wsbc(s0, cv(hs0), w0)))
  rspc(s0, cv(hs0), con0, wi(wral(s1, cv(s0), wsbc(s0, cv(s1), w0)), w0), wi(wral(s1, cv(hs0), wsbc(s0, cv(s1), w0)), wsbc(s0, cv(hs0), w0)))
  nfim(s0, wral(s1, cv(hs0), wsbc(s0, cv(s1), w0)), wsbc(s0, cv(hs0), w0))
  nfral(s0, s1, cv(hs0), wsbc(s0, cv(s1), w0))
  nfcv(s0, cv(hs0))
  nfsbc1v(s0, cv(s1), w0)
  nfsbc1v(s0, cv(hs0), w0)
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wral(s1, cv(s0), wsbc(s0, cv(s1), w0)), w0, wral(s1, cv(hs0), wsbc(s0, cv(s1), w0)), wsbc(s0, cv(hs0), w0))
  raleq(s1, cv(s0), cv(hs0), wsbc(s0, cv(s1), w0))
  sbceq1a(s0, cv(hs0), w0)
  simpr(wral(s0, con0, wi(wral(s1, cv(s0), wsbc(s0, cv(s1), w0)), w0)), wcel(cv(hs0), con0))
  elrabsf(s0, cv(hs0), con0, w0)
  nfcv(s0, con0)
  tfi(hs0, crab(s0, con0, w0))
  rabid2(s0, con0, w0)
  diff.con0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.w(wral(s0, con0, wi(wral(s1, cv(s0), wsbc(s0, cv(s1), w0)), w0)))
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.crab.s(s1, s0, con0, w0)
  diff.con0.s(s1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.hs0.c(crab(s0, con0, w0))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm tfisg(setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (∀(s0 ∈ On,(∀(s1 ∈ s0,[s1 / s0]w0)→ w0))→ ∀(s0 ∈ On, w0))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  sylib(∀(s0 ∈ On,(∀(s1 ∈ s0,[s1 / s0]w0)→ w0)), ∀(s0 ∈ On, w0), On = { s0 ∈ On | w0 })
  eqcomd(con0, { s0 ∈ On | w0 }, ∀(s0 ∈ On,(∀(s1 ∈ s0,[s1 / s0]w0)→ w0)))
  sylancr(∀(s0 ∈ On,(∀(s1 ∈ s0,[s1 / s0]w0)→ w0)), { s0 ∈ On | w0 } = On, { s0 ∈ On | w0 } ⊆ On, ∀(hs0 ∈ On,(hs0 ⊆ { s0 ∈ On | w0 } → hs0 ∈ { s0 ∈ On | w0 })))
  ssrab2(s0, con0, w0)
  ralrimiva(hs0, con0, ∀(s0 ∈ On,(∀(s1 ∈ s0,[s1 / s0]w0)→ w0)), (hs0 ⊆ { s0 ∈ On | w0 } → hs0 ∈ { s0 ∈ On | w0 }))
  syl6ibr((∀(s0 ∈ On,(∀(s1 ∈ s0,[s1 / s0]w0)→ w0))∧ hs0 ∈ On), hs0 ⊆ { s0 ∈ On | w0 }, hs0 ∈ { s0 ∈ On | w0 }, (hs0 ∈ On ∧[hs0 / s0]w0))
  jctild((∀(s0 ∈ On,(∀(s1 ∈ s0,[s1 / s0]w0)→ w0))∧ hs0 ∈ On), hs0 ⊆ { s0 ∈ On | w0 }, hs0 ∈ On, [hs0 / s0]w0)
  syl5((∀(s0 ∈ On,(∀(s1 ∈ s0,[s1 / s0]w0)→ w0))∧ hs0 ∈ On), hs0 ⊆ { s0 ∈ On | w0 }, [hs0 / s0]w0, ∀(s1 ∈ hs0,[s1 / s0]w0))
  sylbi(hs0 ⊆ { s0 ∈ On | w0 }, ∀(s1 ∈ hs0,[s1 / s0]w0), ∀(s1 ∈ hs0, s1 ∈ { s0 ∈ On | w0 }))
  dfss3(s1, hs0, { s0 ∈ On | w0 })
  ralimi(s1, hs0, s1 ∈ { s0 ∈ On | w0 }, [s1 / s0]w0)
  simprbi(s1 ∈ { s0 ∈ On | w0 }, [s1 / s0]w0, s1 ∈ On)
  elrabsf(s0, s1, con0, w0)
  impcom(∀(s0 ∈ On,(∀(s1 ∈ s0,[s1 / s0]w0)→ w0)), hs0 ∈ On, (∀(s1 ∈ hs0,[s1 / s0]w0)→[hs0 / s0]w0))
  rspc(s0, hs0, con0, (∀(s1 ∈ s0,[s1 / s0]w0)→ w0), (∀(s1 ∈ hs0,[s1 / s0]w0)→[hs0 / s0]w0))
  nfim(s0, ∀(s1 ∈ hs0,[s1 / s0]w0), [hs0 / s0]w0)
  nfral(s0, s1, hs0, [s1 / s0]w0)
  nfcv(s0, hs0)
  nfsbc1v(s0, s1, w0)
  nfsbc1v(s0, hs0, w0)
  imbi12d(s0 = hs0, ∀(s1 ∈ s0,[s1 / s0]w0), w0, ∀(s1 ∈ hs0,[s1 / s0]w0), [hs0 / s0]w0)
  raleq(s1, s0, hs0, [s1 / s0]w0)
  sbceq1a(s0, hs0, w0)
  simpr(∀(s0 ∈ On,(∀(s1 ∈ s0,[s1 / s0]w0)→ w0)), hs0 ∈ On)
  elrabsf(s0, hs0, con0, w0)
  nfcv(s0, con0)
  tfi(hs0, { s0 ∈ On | w0 })
  rabid2(s0, con0, w0)
  diff.con0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.w(∀(s0 ∈ On,(∀(s1 ∈ s0,[s1 / s0]w0)→ w0)))
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.crab.s(s1, s0, con0, w0)
  diff.con0.s(s1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.hs0.c({ s0 ∈ On | w0 })
}
